and the time of day

an id for the handset that is coming

was generally network operators
differentiate between what's called
active events and passive events
now active events are things that you

call
you browse the internet
you move from what's called a location

move from one location area to another

they would know when you cross this

make a notice off you crossed that

and in terms of passive events
there is a ping that's being sent out

phone is being stationary somewhere
you're not using it you're not doing
